title: U.S. House Oversight Committee
description: Testified on implementing the JOBS Act crowdfunding provisions, balancing innovation with investor protection in emerging fintech markets. Recommended raising crowdfunding cap from $1M to $5M to better support startups.

title: U.S. House Financial Services Committee
description: Provided expert statement on crowdfunding market structure, regulatory frameworks, and the role of technology platforms in democratizing access to capital while maintaining market integrity and investor protection. Warned that overly strict compliance requirements could "limit the rate we're able to domestically innovate and create jobs."
